aim-assist.config.title: Aim Assist Settings
aim-assist.config.range.tooltip: How far the aim assist can reach
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.title: Aim Assist
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.enable: Master toggle for aim assist logic
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.showGh: Visual indicator of the predicted impact point
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.leadTa: Lead your shots by estimating the target's future position
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.compen: Adjust vertical aim to compensate for arrow drop and drag
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.maxAss: Maximum distance (in blocks) to activate aim assist
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.gravit: How fast arrows fall per tick (default: 0.05)
Increase for stronger drop; decrease for flatter shots
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.drag.@: Multiplier applied each tick to horizontal arrow velocity
Lower value = more slowdown over distance
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.arrowS: Base arrow speed (draw strength x factor)
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.iterat: Number of refinement passes for target prediction
text.autoconfig.aim-assist.option.assist: Half-angle around the crosshair where targets are recognised
0% = gentle nudge, 100% = full snap to target
Maximum angle the assist can adjust per tick
